about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn more about my background as a Software Engineer and my expertise in AI-accelerated web development.

story.paragraph1: I'm a Software Engineer specializing in Full Stack Development with expertise in React, Next.js, Node.js, databases, and modern web technologies. I'm passionate about creating efficient, user-centered applications that solve real-world problems.
story.paragraph2: What sets me apart is my proficiency with AI development tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Cursor. I leverage these tools to accelerate my development process, improve code quality, and deliver solutions faster than traditional methods.
story.paragraph3: I believe in the power of AI-human collaboration in software engineering. By combining engineering principles with AI assistance, I create scalable, maintainable solutions while staying at the forefront of modern development practices.
